name: Media - Nested
heading: nested media
description: Documentation and examples for Bootstrap's media object to construct highly repetitive components like blog comments, tweets, and the like.
usage: Media objects can be infinitely nested, though we suggest you stop at some point. Place nested .media within the .media-body of a parent media object.
